contents.text: Welcome to General Assembly San Francisco, where we prepare you and your business for the fast-paced world of technology.
To explore our upcoming tech and design courses, press 1.
To speak with an admissions advisor, press 1.
Connecting you to an admissions advisor. Please hold.

navigationGoals: I need to speak with an admissions advisor about enrolling in a tech or design course.
I want to speak with an admissions advisor about leveraging my veteran education benefits for an upcoming software engineering bootcamp.
Discuss program prerequisites and technical skill requirements with an admissions advisor.
Please connect me to someone who can help me enroll in a tech course.
I want to speak with an admissions advisor about course prerequisites and how your tech and design programs fit my physics background.

contents.text: To hear about upcoming class schedules and tuition fees, press 2.
Please hold while we retrieve the upcoming class schedules and tuition details.

navigationGoals: I want details on upcoming class schedules and tuition fees.
I need the schedule and cost details for your next part-time UX design course under the GI Bill.
Get the upcoming schedule and detailed tuition breakdown for the UX Design course.
I’d like assistance finding out when the next classes start and how much they cost.
I’d like information on upcoming class dates and tuition costs for your tech and design courses.

contents.text: For corporate training solutions and team upskilling, press 2.
To discuss a custom curriculum for your organization, press 1.
Connecting you with our corporate training team. Please hold.

navigationGoals: I'm looking to develop a custom corporate training program for my team.
I'd like to set up a custom corporate training for my nonprofit veteran outreach team.
Design a bespoke corporate training curriculum for our engineering team.
I need help designing a custom training program for my small community group.
I’m interested in creating a tailored training program for my research group—can I discuss a custom curriculum?

contents.text: For information on group rates and partnership opportunities, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our partnerships specialist.

navigationGoals: I need information on group rates and partnership options for corporate training.
I'm interested in group pricing or partnerships for organizing a career transition workshop for veterans.
Obtain information on group pricing tiers and partnership frameworks for enterprise training.

I’d like details on group discounts and partnership opportunities for our physics study team.
